channel.title: Help Making a new server on testscape
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]If anyone could help just leave message [/glow][glow=red,2,300][size=10pt] main problems is connecting to [/size] [size=10pt]internet and getting friends on the server[/size][/glow]
i'm wondering if anyone could help me i'm trying to make a new server thats offline my firend is also making one on testscape so if anyone could help us? :| i have experience with java so i'm alright at it i just need some tips like how to get it online and how to add stuff. :)
This is my first post so be nice :)

item.title: Help Making a new server on testscape
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Well, there is a great tutorial to make a server by The Soul, please go to this link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html and follow the tutorial and you should have no problems.

Read full topic
